summary: Completed comprehensive mobile-first testing of Plantão do Smash delivery site. Site loads correctly in mobile viewport (390x844) with proper Spanish localization for Ciudad del Este, Paraguay. All major features working including header navigation, hero section, 2-column product grid, horizontal scrolling categories, product modals with ingredient pills, Guaraníes pricing, cart functionality, and location services. Minor modal interaction issues found with overlay interception.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay interception preventing some button clicks (quantity counter, close buttons)
Cart counter not always visible after adding items

passed_tests: Header with logo, location button, and cart button
Hero section with floating image and Spanish text for Ciudad del Este
Menu section with 2-column grid on mobile (5 grid containers found)
Categories with horizontal scroll (5 category elements)
Product cards with rounded images (9/11 images rounded)
Product modal opens and displays ingredients in pills
Guaraníes pricing (Gs.) displayed correctly throughout site
Cart drawer opens and closes properly
Location button functionality (shows 'Fuera de zona' as expected)
Glassmorphism effects implemented (26 elements with backdrop-blur)
Footer with Ciudad del Este information
success_percentage: frontend: 85% - Most features working correctly with minor interaction issues
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay interception issues preventing smooth button interactions in ProductModal component. Consider using force=true for modal button clicks or adjusting z-index/pointer-events CSS.
